title: Large Language Models as Co-Pilots for Causal Inference in Medical Studies
details: A Alaa, RV Phillips, E Kıcıman, LB Balzer… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: The validity of medical studies based on real-world clinical data, such as observational studies, depends on critical assumptions necessary for drawing causal conclusions about medical interventions. Many published studies are flawed …
